name: Hallway Madness
description:
Hallway Madness! A horror game inspired by the backroom. This took roughly 25 days.
Wander through a maze, complete one type of task to win! However there is something lurking within..

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Shift - Sprint(Default)
Interact - E(Default)

Assets used:

Developer Jake(YouTube) - Textures
Various sounds from Pixabay and Unity Asset store
